page.title: 20OUR SCHOOL, EAST BARKWITH
page.content: The information on this area was collected and collated by the children of{East Barkwith Church of England {(Aided) Primary School.}In the summer of 1985, the school consisted of an Infants class of eleven children aged between four and seven, and a Junior class of children aged between eight and eleven. The Junior class collected the Domesday material. The children involved were:- 8 years old: Sarah Spence, Helen Blakey, Gavin Drury, Neal Harrison. 9 years old: Kayleigh Ward, Noel Ingleton 10 years old: Christopher Marriott, Nicholas Kirk, Jayne Clark, Roland Stoker. 11 years old: Annette Lee, Sarah Moreton, Carl Rounce, Peter Lacey, Kevin Blakey, Rory Day, Gary Drury.
